JSimSocketImpl - class drcl.inet.socket.JSimSocketImpl.
In the framework of running real applications on JSim, this class provides a special socket implementation to intercept all the standard Java socket API calls.
JSimSocketImpl(Launcher, InetAddress, Port, Port, Node) - Constructor for class drcl.inet.socket.JSimSocketImpl
 
join(Wire) - Method in class drcl.comp.Wire
Joins the wire that_ to this.

joinIn(Port) - Method in class drcl.comp.Wire
Joins the wire as IN to receive data from the wire.
joinInOut(Port) - Method in class drcl.comp.Wire
Joins the wire for both send and receive data.
joinOut(Port) - Method in class drcl.comp.Wire
Joins the wire as OUT to send data to the wire.
